name: Gardener (J̷̻̇a̷͖͝s̷̭̿o̶͔̕ñ̴̞)
description:
Gardener takes breading games to a new level, allowing you to bread plants and unlock new species, but also the soil required for those new plants is also breadable!

The game includes:

  • An ingame learning gui to teach you how to bread all of the diferent types of soil and plants alike!
  • 10 types of soil, 4 of which are the starting species
  • 13 types of plants, 2 of which are the starting species

Credits (with twitter links):

  • The programming was done by Jason (me)     @JasonMilian7
  • Art by RavenTale     @zsoka75
